name: Evolving Antivirus
description:
Protect the host PC from the evil virus using your constantly changing antivirus tank! Made in 48 hours for DJAM #5
~ ~ ~
Controls:
WASD to move
MOUSE/LMB to aim and fire
ESC to return to title screen
~ ~ ~
Assets Used:
Chiptune Interlude Pack - 3xBlast
Glitchy Battle - 3xBlast
~ ~ ~
Going for a highscore? Send an email to emcannongames@gmail.com!
